thread.title: Cleco to host debt investor conference call

author: cnbc.com
title: Cleco to host debt investor conference call
text:
PINEVILLE, La., - Today, Cleco Corporate Holdings LLC (Cleco) announced that it will hold a conference call with debt investors on Friday, Feb. 23, 2018 at 12:30 p.m. Central time.
Cleco executive officers will conduct a conference call to discuss the company's financial results and strategy, which includes its plans to acquire NRG South Central Generating LLC, a subsidiary of NRG Energy, Inc.
Debt investors, analysts and other interested parties can access the live conference call by dialing 1 (866) 352-2112 or 1 (630) 691-2779 if outside the U.S. and using conference ID 9200268. A replay of the call will be available until March 16, 2018. The dial-in number for the telephone replay is 1 (888) 843-7419 or 1 (630) 652-3042 if outside the U.S. and the conference ID is 9200268.
Cleco Corporate Holdings LLC is a regional energy company that conducts substantially all of its business operation through its primary subsidiary, Cleco Power. Cleco Power is a regulated electric utility company that owns nine generating units with a total nameplate capacity of 3,310 MWs and serves approximately 288,000 customers in Louisiana through its retail business and supplies wholesale power in Louisiana and Mississippi. For more information about Cleco, visit us at www.cleco.com .
